name: Color.Hcl

aliases.name: HCL
aliases.comment:
HCL record.

Ranges:

  - h: 0..360
  - c: 0..100
  - l: 0..150
  - a: 0..1

See this color picker: <https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3e115519a1b495e0bd95>
aliases.type: { hue : Float, chroma : Float, luminance : Float, alpha : Float }

aliases.name: RGB
aliases.comment:
RGB record.

Ranges:

  - r: 0..255
  - g: 0..255
  - b: 0..255
  - a: 0..1

See this color picker: <https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3e115519a1b495e0bd95>
aliases.type: { red : Int, green : Int, blue : Int, alpha : Float }

values.name: fromColor
values.comment: Constructs a HCL record from a `Color`.

values.name: toColor
values.comment: Constructs a `Color` from a HCL record.
